title: My Demon King Plush - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Mystery   Romance   Shounen Ai   Supernatural
tags: Beasts   Daoism   Demon Lord   Demons   Ghosts   Handsome Male Lead   Honest Protagonist   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Misunderstandings   Seme Protagonist   Shapeshifters   Younger Love Interests
author: 汝尘肆
description:
Here's the thing.
The big demon Baiju, who was invited down the mountain by the Demon Management Bureau, was very satisfied with the guardian assigned to him.

He was tall and had long legs, with a clean face and a calm temperament. He also cooked well.

And although there was always a strange murmurs from his heart, it wasn't a big deal.

The only thing that puzzled him was that this human seemed to like to play with his white hair.

Xiao Yao, renown for his elite untouchable presence, with his face buried in dog fur: Hey.>
